name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Aaron CARROLL, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Aaron CARROLL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Judgments of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence S: Rosenwald, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Bernard Siegel, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 494
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Aaron CARROLL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 21, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Lawrence S: Rosenwald, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Bernard Siegel, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
